text: Amabagan is a local market business place located in sector 19 of city Rourkela. The place is famous for its various local shops settled around the area where shops ranging from commodities and vegetable market are crowded with daily customers coming from near by locality around the city for shopping and hangout. Ambagan is also known as Ispat Super Market. Nearby to this place lies Ispat food court where local street food vendor shops are available. Category:Rourkela
title: Ambagan, Rourkela
